descriptionHtml:
[b][size=5]Hotkey for Cannibalistic Feeding[/size][/b] [size=1]beta[/size]

[u]Description[/u]

Mod removes this annoying mouse-only-and-all-keyboard-controls-disabled dialog, where you can choose Feed or Search while having Ring of Namira on.

[img]http://i27.fastpic.ru/big/2012/0101/75/3f0abfb1b044ac7e27783999f5c81c75.jpeg[/img]

Mod detects when ring is used and removes Cannibal perk gained from it.
You still can feed by pressing X while standing near the dead body and pointing to it (hotkey is configurable from the mod's ini file).

[u]Installation instructions[/u]

1. Mod needs [url=http://alexander.sannybuilder.com/?category=other&altname=skyrim_script_dragon][b]Script Dragon[/b][/url] to be installed.

2. Copy hotkeyfeed.asi and hotkeyfeed.ini to game's root folder.

3. That's all :)

[u]Known issues[/u]

[b]Your character must stand over the dead body looking down on it for successful feeding.[/b]
This is because Script Dragon cannot get the reference of an object you are targeting,
so this mod finds the coordinates on the ground you are pointing to based on character height and viewing angle, then finds the nearest actor (dead body) around that point.

[u]Version History[/u]

1.1beta
- Mod actually works now :)

[b]My new mod[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12338]Drem Fah Pah Nahl[/url]
author: Mikanoshi
